title: League client wont open!
body:
This has been happening ever since I updated to the new League of Legends **Client Open Beta**. I am sometimes successful with getting into the login screen but 90% of the time it just doesn't come up after I click the League icon on my desktop. I am playing on a **mac** and the only way so far I have found to fix it is to **restart** my computer, this process takes way to long so usually I have to wait 10 minutes before getting it to work. 

I am looking for a **quick fix** for this bug, if it is happening to anyone else using a mac or even windows please let me know.

replies.body: yea, same right here and iam using window
Mine just took 14 minutes to open!
Please, this still happens all the time and I would really like it to be fixed.
